bibl.title: Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine

series.title: Culture and History of the Ancient Near East.

bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M., The Roman Census in the Papyri from the Judaean Desert and the Egyptian κατ’ οἰκίαν ἀπογραφή.

Lawrence H. SCHIFFMAN (Ed.), Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 14 (Leiden, 2003) pp. 105-122, 2 tabl.
